title: Is it permissible to save money in Islam? - Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: second question was is it permissible to save money the answer is yes whether you save it for a rainy day whether you save it for a wedding for traveling for education for medical expenses for something you don't know what will happen in the future there is no problem in that none whatsoever and this is part of wisdom scholars used to define being wise being perfect who is a perfect person there is to say our effort on feeding chastity and religion and patients over calamities number two if you have these two then you're on the right track thirdly they say to do well in facilitating and managing your life someone who pays every thing he has in his pocket and then he doesn't have enough to eat or to take care of his family this person is not wise because he does not have the means so part of perfection and being wise is to know how to handle and to manage your savings and your income and your expenditures
